name: Project 1
description: Ideal if you are looking to maintain your fitness level and to keep accountable.
points: Personalized Client E-Guide, giving you all the advice and knowledge you need to keep on track.
Join the Active Balance community. Talk with other members, join in on challenges, events and keep up to date on blog posts.
Access to your coach. Talk with Ashley via WhatsApp during the week. Need a pep talk? Vent? Extra advice, she is there for you.
Inclusive with one session per week.

name: Project 2
description: Ideal if you're looking to elevate your training.
points: Personalized Client E-Guide, giving you all the advice and knowledge you need to keep on track.
Join the Active Balance community. Talk with other members, join in on challenges, events and keep up to date on blog posts.
Access to your coach. Talk with Ashley via WhatsApp during the week. Need a pep talk? Vent? Extra advice, she is there for you.
Inclusive with one session per week.

name: Project Virtual
description: Ideal if you are looking for a program that is tailored to your abilities and your environment.

name: Project Online
description: Ideal if you are self-disciplined and you are looking for a program to follow that will elevate your fitness level.
points: Personalized program to suit your workouts at the gym, home or outdoors.

name: Small Group PT
description: Based at Coach Gyms, Hornbeam Park
points: Six one-hour-long personal training sessions in a class format.
Join an exclusive WhatsApp group to meet your team, support one another and have an opportunity to make new friends.
Relax at the Coach Gym Bar for post-workout protein shakes and a chance to develop connections.
Learn new movements using different methods of workouts from a functional class to a workshop format.
Develop complex techniques with in-depth stretching that will benefit your body beyond the workout.
